BookFile.Header:
Save as Unicode UTF-8 text encoding. Skip section 2 in Part 1. Also skipped most of section 35 which had books of observations for particular years.
For volume AJB 08 Index to the Literature of 1906, started 1 Mar 2020, finished 30 Mar 2020, proofread 3 April 2020
